name: Remove-Copilot
commandPattern: Get-AppxPackage *Copilot* | Remove-AppxPackage -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsCopilot' -Force | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsCopilot' -Name 'TurnOffWindowsCopilot' -Type DWord -Value 1
